_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Identifying with different mental factor: When you identify with form, you’re bound by Māra.
When you identify with feeling, you’re bound by Māra.
When you identify with perception, you’re bound by Māra.
When you identify with choices, you’re bound by Māra.
When you identify with consciousness, you’re bound by Māra.
The way to be free from the Wicked One [: Not identifying with form, you’re free from the Wicked One.
Not identifying with feeling, you’re free from the Wicked One.
Not identifying with perception, you’re free from the Wicked One.
Not identifying with choices, you’re free from the Wicked One.
Not identifying with consciousness, you’re free from the Wicked One.
